actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce, H. Rept. 93-786.
Measure laid on table in House, S.J. 185 passed in lieu.

official_title: Joint resolution to provide for advancing the effective date of the final order of the Interstate Commerce Commission in docket No. MC-43 (Sub-No.2).

summary.text: Provides for advancing to not later than February 15, 1974, the effective date of the final order of the Interstate Commerce Commission in Docket No. MC 43 (Sub-No.2), which requires carriers to reimburse their owner-operators for all increases in the price of fuel over the base period May 15, 1973.

titles.title: Joint resolution to provide for advancing the effective date of the final order of the Interstate Commerce Commission in docket No. MC-43 (Sub-No.2).
